bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.summary: UI (front end) issues with frozen layers
bug.description:
This PR fixed the backend with frozen layers: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/pull/3205>https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/pull/3205</denchmark-link>
Front-end still doesn't work reliably for frozen layers: <denchmark-link:https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2360237/24797992/27411b5a-1bd7-11e7-9d1d-c0421a7301e2.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: This must have been fixed at some point: I've used the UI with frozen layers recently, without issue.
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
